name: security
params: Badmintonbuddy DRIVE is SAFE and SECURE.
We understand the importance of your academy data and assure you data security and it is only accessed by your team !!

name: all-about-team(video)
params: You can add your team (coach/admin/staff) and set the right permissions.
You can remove the team member anytime when they leave !!

name: batch-add(video)
params: Batch helps organize all students and members at your academy.
It's simple and easy to add/edit batches !!

name: add-student(video)
params: Add your student and assign them the batch.
Start tracking fees and sending reminders easily !!

name: student-status(video)
params: Set different status for your students.
Know the exact student count, follow-up with the inactive students !!

name: attendance-add(video)
params: Attendance takes just few seconds with Badmintonbuddy DRIVE.
Swipe right for present, swipe left for absent. It's that simple !!

name: enquiry-add(video)
params: Attendance ensures your batches are full all the time.
Add each enquiry and follow-up from within the APP !!

name: subscription-billing(video)
params: Know all about Badmintonbuddy DRIVE subscription.
Trasparent pricing, cancel anytime..no upfront cost !!

name: team-add(do-not-send)
params: You can add your team (coach/admin/staff) and set the right permissions.
Control what they see in the APP !!

name: team-permisions(do-not-send)
params: Add your team and set the right permissions.
Set permissions and give your team only access to what they need !!
